name: Angler's Lake
description:
A little relaxing game about fishing. Inspired by many fishing minigames. Explore Angler's Lake in your trusty boat and catch as many pizes as you can.

No lives, no time limit, no currency, no microtransactions, just fishing!

This is a beta version, as of now you can only play with a Controller (Xbox controller or emulator recommended).

Future goals:

  • International cloud-based leaderboards
  • Mouse & Keyboard controls
  • A LOT of fish balancing
  • A lot of UX improvements

Many thanks to a lot of people who make amazing assets! Here's a list of assets in this game:

  • Kenney's 3D packs, particles and crosshairs
  • Polygon Blacksmith for Toony Tiny People
  • Wello Soft for these skyboxes
  • Jolix for the low poly water
  • Black Hammer for the UI
